unnormalised: Hey everyone! So, I'm finally ready to seriously explore yoga. Been hearing about the amazing benefits for ages from my colleague, Priya, who swears it cured her back pain! But honestly, the sheer variety is overwhelming! Hatha, Vinyasa, Ashtanga...my head's spinning faster than a chakra.
